issue.title: [FCD] Ballot Comment GB-135
issue.discussion:
Addresses GB-135
The first sentence of 29.6p23 was changed by n2992 but now makes no sense: "that is, return false while leaving the contents of memory pointed to by expected before the operation is the same that same as that of the object and the same as that of expected after the operation." There's a minor editorial difference between n2992 ("is that same as that" vs "is the same that same as that") but neither version makes sense. Also, the remark talks about "object" which should probably be "object or this" to cover the member functions which have no object parameter.
Resolution proposed in ballot comment
Fix the Remark to say whatever was intended.
